summary: LETTER FROM DUANE LEACH PRESIDENT REDI HAUL TRAILER  OPPOSING THOSE PROVISIONS OF EARLY WARNING REPORTING REGULATIONS THAT REQUIRE MANUFACTURERS THAT PRODUCE OVER 500 SMALL-TO-MEDIUM   TRAILERS (THOSE  WITH A GROSS VEHICLE WEIGHT RATING, GVWR, OF UNDER 26000 POUNDS) TO SENT A COMPREHENSIVE EARLY WARNING REPORT TO NHTSA. SUCH REPORTING  WOULD CREATE ECONOMIC HARDSHIP FOR MR  DUANE  AND SOME OF HIS COLLEAGUES IN THE TRAILER INDUSTRY AND COULD PUT THEM OUT OF BUSINESS.  *AK
